entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 08 January 2023
